data.message: Mark are there a scam going around telling people that they are a winner from Facebook. If so they are someone using your name saying hes the. CEO of Facebook right now that's what he keeps telling me. I have over a hundred messages from him now. Wanting me to send him money so he can give me my winnings of 6 hundred thousand dollars I've won on Facebook. I don't know what to do about it if it is a scam Please let me know just as soon as you get this message. Marilyn
